mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD_TYPE AS partnerCdType /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER /* 채널 제휴사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD_TYPE = #{partnerCdType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER /* 채널 제휴사 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD_TYPE = #{partnerCdType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD_TYPE AS partnerCdType /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER /* 채널 제휴사 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD = #{param.channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD_TYPE = #{param.partnerCdType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
ORDER BY EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER.CHANNEL_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER SET /* 채널 제휴사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND PARTNER_CD_TYPE = #{partnerCdType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CHANNEL_PARTNER /* 채널 제휴사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND PARTNER_CD_TYPE = #{partnerCdType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
